trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration settings of a language provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示語言提供者的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class to determine whether a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation is configured on the computer, or to examine the configuration and compiler settings for a specific language provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別以決定是否<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作設定的電腦上，或是檢查特定語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔案包含語言提供者和編譯器組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Each configured language provider has a corresponding compiler configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 每個已設定的語言提供者有對應的編譯器組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Each element defines the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation type, supported language names, supported file name extensions, and compiler parameters.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目定義<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作類型、 支援的語言名稱，支援的檔案名稱副檔名，以及編譯器參數。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework defines the initial compiler settings in the machine configuration file.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 電腦組態檔中定義初始的編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: Developers and compiler vendors can add configuration settings for a new <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員和編譯器廠商可以為新的 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> 實作新增組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class provides read-only access to these settings in the machine configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別會提供唯讀存取這些機器組態檔中的設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.GetLanguages%2A>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.GetExtensions%2A>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> members to examine the corresponding configuration attributes for a language provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.GetLanguages%2A>， <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.GetExtensions%2A>，和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>語言提供者會檢查對應的組態屬性的成員。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A> method to obtain the compiler options and warning level attribute values for a language provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A>方法，以取得語言提供者的編譯器選項和警告層級的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For more details on language provider settings in the configuration file, see [Compiler and Language Provider Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關組態檔中的語言提供者設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[編譯器和語言提供者設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8)。

trans-unit.source: This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需連結要求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays language provider configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示語言提供者組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments are used to specify a language, file name extension, or provider type.
trans-unit.target: 命令列引數可用來指定語言、 檔案名稱副檔名或提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: For the given input, the example determines the corresponding language provider and displays the configured language compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: 指定的輸入，此範例會判斷對應的語言提供者，並顯示設定的語言編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the configured <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 取得已設定 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 之實作的類型。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Type" /> instance that represents the configured language provider type.
trans-unit.target: 表示已設定之語言提供者類型的唯讀 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The machine configuration file contains the fully qualified type name for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 電腦組態檔包含每個的完整限定的類型名稱<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property value is a <xref:System.Type> instance that represents a configured language provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Type>表示已設定的語言提供者實作的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，這個範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The language provider is not configured on this computer.
trans-unit.target: 在這部電腦上未設定此語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: Cannot locate the type because it is a <see langword="null" /> or empty string.
trans-unit.target: 找不到型別，因為該型別為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Cannot locate the type because the name for the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> cannot be found in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 找不到型別，因為在組態檔中找不到 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configured compiler settings for the language provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 取得語言提供者實作的已設定編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> instance that contains the compiler options and settings configured for the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> 執行個體，該執行個體包含已經為語言提供者設定的編譯器選項和設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A> method to examine the compiler settings of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instances returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A>方法來檢查的編譯器設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: Each language provider configuration element can contain optional `compilerOptions` and `warningLevel` attributes.
trans-unit.target: 每個語言提供者組態項目可以包含選擇性`compilerOptions`和`warningLevel`屬性。

trans-unit.source: These attributes define the default values for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性定義的預設值為<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the language provider configuration element does not define the `compilerOptions` attribute, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義的語言提供者組態項目`compilerOptions`屬性<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the language provider configuration element does not define the `warningLevel` attribute, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value is –1.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義的語言提供者組態項目`warningLevel`屬性<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，這個範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance for the current language provider settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前語言提供者設定的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance for the current language provider settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前語言提供者設定的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM provider associated with the language provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: 與語言提供者組態相關聯的 CodeDOM 提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A> method returns a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> instance for the current language provider settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>目前的語言提供者設定的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A> method to get a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of provider options from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 來自組態檔的提供者選項集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance for the current language provider settings and specified options.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前語言提供者設定和指定之選項的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM provider associated with the language provider configuration and specified options.
trans-unit.target: 與語言提供者組態和指定之選項相關聯的 CodeDOM 提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.String%7D%29> method returns a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> instance for the current language provider settings and the specified provider options.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.String%7D%29>方法會傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>目前的語言提供者設定與指定的提供者選項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For information about supported provider options, see the specific CodeDOM provider documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援的提供者選項的資訊，請參閱特定的 CodeDOM 提供者文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.String%7D%29> method to get a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.String%7D%29>方法來取得<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="providerOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="providerOptions" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The provider does not support options.
trans-unit.target: 提供者不支援選項。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> 比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same language provider and compiler settings as the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否表示與目前 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> 相同的語言提供者和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> object and its value is the same as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> 物件，且其值與這個執行個體相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The two instances are considered equal if the values of the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: 兩個執行個體視為相等，如果下列屬性的值相等：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A>, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A> properties of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters> instance returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.WarningLevel%2A>， <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.CompilerOptions%2A>，和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters.IncludeDebugInformation%2A>屬性<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateDefaultCompilerParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file name extensions supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語言提供者支援的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: An array of file name extensions supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 語言提供者支援的副檔名陣列。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: Each configured language provider supports one or more file name extensions.
trans-unit.target: 每個已設定的語言提供者支援一或多個檔案名稱的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> might support the file name extensions ".cs" and ".c#".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>可能支援的檔案名稱副檔名".cs"和".c # >。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> 執行個體的 32 位元帶正負號整數雜湊程式碼，適合使用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會為兩個物件產生相同雜湊程式碼，這兩個物件根據 <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.Equals%2A> 方法是相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the provider name, hash code, and default file name extension for the new provider instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會顯示提供者名稱、 雜湊程式碼和新的提供者執行個體的預設檔案名稱副檔名。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the language names supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得語言提供者支援的語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of language names supported by the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 語言提供者支援的語言名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: Each configured language provider supports one or more language names.
trans-unit.target: 每個已設定的語言提供者支援一或多個語言的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> object for a <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> might return an array with the language names "c#", "cs", and "csharp".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>物件<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>可能會傳回與語言名稱"c#"、"cs"，"csharp"的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the language provider implementation is configured on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否已在電腦上設定語言提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the language provider implementation type is configured on the computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經在電腦上設定語言提供者實作類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid%2A> property to check the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation before accessing the provider properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid%2A>屬性檢查<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>才能存取的提供者屬性或方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: For example, after you get the language provider settings from the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A> method, use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid%2A> property to verify the provider type implementation before calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A> method or using the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，之後您取得語言提供者設定從<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.IsCodeDomProviderTypeValid%2A>屬性，確認提供者型別實作，然後再呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CreateProvider%2A>方法或使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo.CodeDomProviderType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓您判斷是否已設定的輸入的語言<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有針對指定的語言設定的提供者，這個範例會顯示語言提供者組態設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: for calling members of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Associated <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value: <see langword="Unrestricted" />; [NIB: Named Permission Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;相關聯<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />列舉值： <see langword="Unrestricted" />;[NIB： 具名使用權限集合](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08250d67-c99d-4ab0-8d2b-b0e12019f6e3): <see langword="FullTrust" />。
